casebody.data:
Green Tree Servicing Mortgage Co.
v.
Gennaro Rauso, as Mark Ferreri's, Tri State Investments 1, LLC's, Assignee; Petition of Gennaro Rauso as Tri State Investments 1 LLC 's Assignee NO. 29 MAL 2016 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania May 10, 2016 Appeal from the Superior Court.

Disposition: Denied.
